attributes.action: Reduce or eliminate taxes for essential workers during the pandemic.
attributes.additional_details:
It's time to start recognising the beneficial impact that workers have on society rather than the economy! Essential workers are currently the life blood of this country. Working more days, longer hours, with increasing levels of stress to keep this country running. Not because we want to, but because we have a duty to! 

Unfortunately, minimum wage, essential careers are being taxed heavily for extra work that can not afford to not be done, while some have the choice to sit at home on full pay.
attributes.background: Learn from the lessons of our forefathers and reevaluate the tax conditions for workers during the Covid-19 pandemic to like those of post World War 2 Britain.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Refund PAYE tax for year 2020/21 to Keyworker and Essential Worker Roles
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568374

Give all key workers a £10,000 tax break (in addition to the existing allowance)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320647

Suspend PAYE Tax for all frontline Key workers for 6 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556818

Give all key workers a tax break for 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568861

Give essential and key workers a tax break/refund.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567150
